title: Oscar Gold
description: Possibly the saddest film of all time. In 1939 Poland, this is the story of Oscar, a Jewish, mentally disabled, alcoholic boy whose voice stood out amongst the war and intolerance.
altHero: a black and white shot of Roger the alien playing Oscar with protruding teeth and dressed in wartime clothing
alt1: Nazi trucks drive through a city that has been destroyed
alt2: Oscar pretends to drive a car as his mother holds him in her arms
alt3: Oscar and his parents talking with a doctor
alt4: Oscar and his family mourn a dead puppy
